service.name: climdb_agg
service.documentation: This web service allows a remote user to access the climdb_agg table from OSU's CLIMHY database. See xxx for more documentation.

method.name: get_agg_monthly
method.sqlcmd: SELECT site_code, station, variable, aggregate_type, year, month, value FROM climdb_agg WHERE site_code = ? and station = ? and variable = ? and aggregate_type = ? and year >= ? and year <= ?
method.documentation: Gets the aggregated data from climdb_raw for a given range of years. Begin and end are years e.g. 1990

method.name: get_agg_yearly
method.sqlcmd: SELECT site_code, station, variable, aggregate_type, year, value FROM climdb_agg WHERE site_code = ? and station = ? and variable = ? and aggregate_type = ? and year >= ? and year <= ? and month = 99
method.documentation: This returns the yearly value of the aggregated varaible over a given range of years. Begin and end are years e.g. 1990

method.name: agg_over_all
method.sqlcmd: SELECT site_code, station, variable, aggregate_type, year, value FROM climdb_agg WHERE site_code = ? and station = ? and variable = ? and aggregate_type = ? and year = 0
method.documentation: This returns the monthly value of the aggregated varaible over the entire period of record.
